an7.84:1.1: “Sattime, bhikkhave, adhikaranasamatha dhamma uppannuppannanam adhikarananam samathaya vupasamaya.
an7.84:1.3: Sammukhavinayo databbo, sativinayo databbo, amulhavinayo databbo, patinnatakaranam databbam, yebhuyyasika databba, tassapapiyasika databba, tinavattharako databbo.
an7.84:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, satta adhikaranasamatha dhamma uppannuppannanam adhikarananam samathaya vupasamaya”ti.
